item.title: VoiceInk Updates
item.description:
VoiceInk v0.51 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 AI enhancement now supports clipboard context

✨ New Improvements

  • 🎯 Batch delete transcripts from Transcript History View
  • 🎯 Improvements in AI Enhancement feature

VoiceInk v0.50 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Added suppport for showing both original as well as enhanced transcript in Transcript History View

✨ New Fixes

  • 🎯 ESC button can now cancel the transcription even when processing

✨ Changes to the Pro Plan

  • 🎯 VoiceInk has removed the free tier. You can keep using the existing versions for free though. All the future versions will required a paid plan.

VoiceInk v0.48 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Added Voice Assistant Feature(Start with Hey VoiceInk, ....... with AI enhancement enabled) .
  • 🎯 Added the option to toggle AI enhancement from the menu bar

VoiceInk v0.47 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Added example support for AI enhancement for better transcript results.

VoiceInk v0.45 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Added dictionary support to improve accuracy

✨ Improvements & Bug Fixes

  • Removed the cloud model support added in previous version
  • Streamlined user interface by removing redundant whisper prompt
  • Added post-processing with AI for improving transcription quality
  • Join our Discord community for detailed discussions on what more changes were made and why

VoiceInk v0.40 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Added Cloud Model Support with free Groq API keys(gives you much better result with transcription processing using LLMs)

✨ Improvements

  • 🎯 Made improvements to recorder view.
  • 🎯 Made it easy to switch between push-to-talk keys.

VoiceInk v0.32 Release Notes

✨ Improvements

  • 🎯 Redesigned the recorder view to make it better.

VoiceInk v0.31 Release Notes

✨ Bug Fixes

  • 🎯 Fixed double pasting transcription with keyboard shortcut bug

VoiceInk v0.30 Release Notes

✨ New Improvements

  • 🎯 Choose between right option key or the function key for push-to-talk feature now

VoiceInk v0.29 Release Notes

✨ New Improvements

  • 🎯 Added the option to copy transcript to clipboard

VoiceInk v0.28 Release Notes

✨ New Fixes

  • 🎯 FIxed High CPU usages even when the app is idle
  • 🕰️ Fixed the efficiency calculator not working properly
  • 🤝 Fixed the purchase URL not working

VoiceInk v0.27 Release Notes

✨ New Fixes

  • 🎯 Rewrote the push-to-talk feature to always use the right option key for easier access

VoiceInk v0.26 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Push to Talk Feature
  • 🤝 A direct way to purchase and get pro version of the app

VoiceInk v0.25 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Initial Prompt Support: Enhance output quality with refined input prompts
  • 🤝 Discord Community Integration: Give feature requests as well as get support
